questions.quote: Look, I'm really getting tired off all the fighting. Maybe we should just end this before we really start hating each other.
Nothing. A bottle broke. That's all. What do you mean, you're gonna move in here?
here Elaine here, Superman  please, next time it will only be the two of us
Why, because I threw the card out? How long was I supposed to save it?
Yeah. Hmm. Boy these really do pinch. I tell you, if I ever find the son of a bitch that stole my glasses...
Kramer, listen to me. Listen! This is a once in a lifetime opportunity. Â Your dreams have been shattered, somebody's got to be held accountable. Come on, we'll take for every penny she's got!
Well, you never know.  Let's see how many I can fit in my mouth.
No you wouldn't. Nobody would. It's just that... they were missing, and... well I'm just inquiring.
Oh, Elaine. My boy's a man today. Can you believe it? He's a man.
Well, I wouldn't want you to do that. You know there's a lot of losers out there.
